topic: Jimmy Kimmel's suspension and return following political pressure and free speech debate.
evaluation: This cluster details the continuous story of Jimmy Kimmel's suspension from ABC after comments on Charlie Kirk's killing, the resulting political and public outcry over free speech, and his eventual return to air. The story progresses chronologically from the initial suspension and immediate reactions (Trump's celebration, boycott calls, peer support, and Democratic leaders demanding FCC chair's resignation) to the announcement of his return and his personal statement. Article 'us-news/2025/sep/18/jimmy-kimmel-show-trump' was de-noised due to significant redundancy with 'us-news/2025/sep/19/trump-administration-news-updates-today' and 'us-news/2025/sep/18/jimmy-kimmel-suspended-trump', as its core information about Trump's threats to networks was better covered and fact-checked in the later article, while Trump's direct reaction to Kimmel was adequately covered.
